item.description:
Specific Topic: Defining Your Future With WELL FORMED OUTCOMES

Special guest speaker this evening - Tom Maloney.  Tom has been actively involved in NLP for many years.  He is a Master Practitioner and Coach.  His specialty is Well Formed Outcomes.  He has been coaching people on how to get what they want by creating Well Formed Outcomes for many years.  We are very please to have him come and present this workshop.

If you have been working on creating focus and goals in your life, you certainly want to attend this one.

Come Learn and Play!!

 


Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Methuen -Defining Your Future With WELL FORMED OUTCOMES
